description:
The wireless Input set acts as a portable mini-sized keyboard and keypad that can be easily carried.
Keyswitches: Membrane switch with tactile feedback
Key Layout: 57 keys
Hot keys: 9 Hot Keys, Left & Right Mouse click, Mode Switch
Keycap size(pitch): Mobile Phone Style Key Switch
Weight(g): 106g
Dimension(L x W x H mm): 125x86x18mm
RF receiver: 40.9x17.7x9mm
Compatibility OS: Windows XP/ Vista / Windows 7
Transmission Distance: 10 meters (depend on user environment)
Battery Type: 2 AAA Batteries
Operation Frequency: RF 2.4GHz ISM band
title: CE Compass Mini Wireless Keyboard with Touchpad Mouse PC Remote Control
